vote.title: Authorize (1) an increase to the construction services contract with Vescorp Construction, LLC dba Chavez Concrete Cutting to implement an Alley Trail Conversion Project on a select group of alleys in various locations; (2) reducing Street and Alley Improvements Fund capacity by $3,031,696.07; and (3) replace the fund capacity with Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery and Community Development Block Grant funds for a zero-dollar change order, keeping the contract amount at $13,887,150.00 - Financing: Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery Funds (ARPA) ($2,031,696.07), Community Development Block Grant Fund (CDBG) ($1,000,000.00)
vote.description: Authorize (1) an increase to the construction services contract with Vescorp Construction, LLC dba Chavez Concrete Cutting to implement an Alley Trail Conversion Project on a select group of alleys in various locations; (2) reducing Street and Alley Improvements Fund capacity by $3,031,696.07; and (3) replace the fund capacity with Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery and Community Development Block Grant funds for a zero-dollar change order, keeping the contract amount at $13,887,150.00 - Financing: Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery Funds (ARPA) ($2,031,696.07), Community Development Block Grant Fund (CDBG) ($1,000,000.00)
